metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16680 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in GNOME file-roller before 3.29.91. It allows asingle ./../ path traversal via a filename contained in a TAR archive,possibly overwriting a file during extraction.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16680` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

file-roller - 3.28.0-1ubuntu1.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: file-roller package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.28.0-1ubuntu1.1').
